book.title: Mystics at Prayer
book.author: Rosicrucian Order, AMORC/Compiled by Many Cihlar/ Intro by H.Spencer Lewis
book.discription: This collection of nineteen essays covers a wide range of philosophical concepts. As you will discover, truth is elusive as it varies from one person to another; and it is never static as it changes even within the individualâ€™s life though the expansion of consciousness and knowledge.
